attributes.action: Immediately sort out Mental Health "care" which is in a complete state of shambles and not fit for purpose.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have just suffered a severe breakdown and apart from my very overworked GP who has been marvellous (who went through a similar problem herself some years ago) I have been TOTALLY failed by the mental health system - with no help being provided whatsoever - my partner had to retrieve me and look after me herself as best she could at a very difficult time.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
